author: craigmcc
msg: Update line endings only (\r \n -> \n).  No content changes.

author: remm
msg: - Fix a problem where the "configClass" attribute was used for two things:
- The config class of the component (either Engine or Host), as intended
- The config class of the child component (either Host or Context)
Obviously, this is a problem, as the config class usually doesn't do both.
- This patch renames the attributes used to define the config class of the
component. Another solution would be to change the attribute name for the
config class of the child component, but this was more complex to do.

author: remm
msg: - The Registry should be the only component to create a MBean server. That
way, other components can add beans to the server without relying
on Catalina-specific mechanisms (they would only need the modeler).

author: remm
msg: - Actually call setServer on the service, so that Service.getServer returns

author: remm
msg: - Fix bug 4797. I had forgotten to add back the naming rules for the default
